name: E-News
description: Are you doing a newsletter? Here's what we're currently using.

name: Event Info
description: Are you inviting someone to an event?! Here's a block to show some info about it!

name: Header
description: Here's the header for all of our Emails. You can use two different varieties of it, either with or without the Donate button.

name: Hero Image
description: This is the large image used at the top of most of our emails.

name: VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation Email Documentation
description: This is the home of all email templates for the VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation

name: Invitation
description: Are you inviting someone to a thing we're doing? RSVPS, ETC. This is the template to use for that!

name: Pull Quote
description: This is a quote you can use in your email templates.

name: Bordered Wrapper
description: This is the bordered wrapper for our email templates

name: Regular Wrapper
description: This is the non-bordered wrapper that we use for the majority of our emails.
